results.title: Science and agriculture: the soy bean
results.brief_description: A study of the interdependence of science and agriculture in modern life. In a fairly detailed study of the soy bean, its cultivation in China and the USA is shown; the processes of extracting soy bean oil, and the preparation and use of soy bean by-products in the home and in industry are shown.

results.title: Science and sheep breeding
results.brief_description: The story of the theory and research which lies behind the practical recommendations for a more accurate and efficient method of selecting merino sheep for wool production. If the breeder uses fleece-weighing as well as the usual methods of classing by eye, they can expect to double the rate of increase in fleece weight.
results.description: The story of the theory and research which lies behind the practical recommendations for a more accurate and efficient method of selecting merino sheep for wool production. If the breeder uses fleece-weighing as well as the usual methods of classing by eye, they can expect to double the rate of increase in fleece weight.

results.title: Schubert's 'Unfinished Symphony'
results.creator_credit: George Freedland, George Richfield and Official Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Musical masterpieces”.
The Radio Philharmonic Orchestra of Italy, under the baton of Fernando Previtali, performs the famous “Unfinished Symphony” of Schubert.

results.title: The School of military engineering
results.brief_description: The instruction and training of engineers in the Australian Military Forces. Shows teaching facilities of the School of Military Engineering. Illustrates the jobs army engineers are required to do: the building of sewages disposal plants; demolition of bridges; the laying of land mines, also the detection and disposal of enemy mines.

results.title: School life in japan
results.brief_description: A survey of present day educational facilities for children in Japan, from pre-school to university. The film underlines the value which the Japanese place on a good educational system.

results.title: School in Cologne
results.creator_credit: Graham Wallace and Kosmos Film Produktion
results.brief_description: A vivid picture of the physical and human difficulties facing the authorities trying to rebuild educational facilities in the western zone of post-war Germany. Cold, hunger, bomb-blasted buildings, shortage of teachers, lack of suitable textbooks, are but some of the difficulties which must be overcome.
results.description: A vivid picture of the physical and human difficulties facing the authorities trying to rebuild educational facilities in the western zone of post-war Germany. results.title: Scandinavian Lands (Norway, Sweden, Denmark)
results.brief_description: An introduction to the geography, people, customs and standards of living of Norway, Sweden and Denmark. Explains that the Scandinavian peoples have utilized effectively the resources of the mountain, plain and sea in the development of agriculture, industry, trade and recreation.
results.description: An introduction to the geography, people, customs and standards of living of Norway, Sweden and Denmark. results.title: Save the soil
results.creator_credit: Raymond Evans and Division of Motion Pictures Extension Service
results.brief_description: A general discussion on the problem of soil conservation. Various ways in which soil can be conserved and protected are demonstrated, including: terracing; cover-cropping to prevent erosion; crop rotation; use of manures and commercial fertilizers.
